maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/290/setti.orig: The tour does not include the river area. We've been there yesterday already.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/290/setti.text: Экскурсия не включает речной район. Мы уже были там вчера.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/394/setti.orig: Japp, here it is. That large building right over there.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/394/setti.text: Japp (Йеп), вот оно. Это большое здание вон там.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/397/setti.orig: Don't go up there, they'll punch ya....
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/397/setti.text: Не ходи туда, они тебя побьют...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/402/setti.orig: Hi. Welcome to this small little hellhole.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/402/setti.text: Привет. Добро пожаловать в эту маленькую адскую дыру.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Now take the fish and cook it up in the jelly for 2 hours...
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Теперь возьмём рыбу и приготовим из неё желе в течение двух часов...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Добавим кунжут, приправим перцем и орегано.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add lemon juice. Add the pineapple. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Добавим лимонный сок.\. Добавим ананас.\. Жарим двадцать минут.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Cover in breadcrumbs, fry another 30 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Покроем панировочными сухарями, жарим ещё тридцать минут.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Wrap it with two layers of cheese. Deep fry for 15 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Обернём её двумя слоями сыра. Жарим во фритюре пятнадцать минут.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add water and bring it to a boil for 2 hours or until soft.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Добавим воду и варим в течение двух часов или до мягкости.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Mix it all up in the blender and let it cool for an hour. That's how you make the jelly.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Смешаем всё в блендере и дадим ему остыть в течение часа. Вот как делается желе.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey, you two! What is it with this place?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Эй, вы двое! Что не так с этим местом?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Добавим кунжут, приправим перцем и орегано.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey! Are you listening to me?
Add lemon juice.\. Add the pineapple.\. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Добавим лимонный сок.\. Добавим ананас.\. Жарим двадцать минут.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: W-What the heck is wrong with you?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Ч-Что, чёрт побери, с вами не так?!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: You... what is it with this place?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Ты... что не так с этим местом?!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey, Metal Face! Talk to me!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Эй, металлическая морда! Поговори со мной!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: DAMN IT! THIS CAN'T BE REAL!!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I just died and respawned, didn't I?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Я просто умер и возродился, не так ли?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Well, at least we won't die in real life when we die in-game. That's something.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Ну, по крайней мере, мы не умираем в реальной жизни, когда умираем в игре. Это уже что-то.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: You remember that strange feeling I mentioned before?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Ты помнишь то странное чувство, которое я упоминал раньше?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I figured it out.\. I can't remember things.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Я понял.\. Я ничего не могу вспомнить.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I can't remember what... is outside of the game.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Я не могу вспомнить, что... за пределами игры.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Is it the same for you?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Ты тоже?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I see...
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Понятно...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Things are just very blurry right now. Do you think our memories will return?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Сейчас всё очень размыто. Как ты думаешь, наши воспоминания вернутся?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Did... did it already happen for you?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: С... с тобой уже такое было?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: That... is good to know.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Это... хорошая новость.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: There's got to be a way out of this.\. There just has to be.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Должен быть выход из всего этого.\. Он просто должен быть.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Let's return to our rooms, ok?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Давай вернёмся в наши комнаты, ладно?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Maybe there is a way to properly rest in there, however that works.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Может быть, есть способ нормально отдохнуть там, как бы это ни работало.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Lea, do I understand this correctly? All the avatars in this area cannot log out?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Лея, я правильно понял? Все аватары в этой области не могут выйти?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: [кивает]

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: ...Why?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: ...Почему?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Sorry, I do not know. This is all extremely bizarre.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Извини, но я не знаю. Это всё очень странно.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I looked a bit into this place...
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Я взглянул поближе на это место...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Lea, is something the matter?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Лея, что-то случилось?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Just go ahead, I will tell you later.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Просто иди, я расскажу тебе позже.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Head back to your room in the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Вернитесь в свою комнату в \c[3]общежитии\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Here we are in the \c[3]town center\c[0].
The town doesn't really have a name, so let's just stick with \c[3]Vermillion Town\c[0] for now.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: У города на самом деле нет названия, так что давай пока просто остановимся на \c[3]Вермиллион\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Vermillion Town! Home of the metal blocks and endless pipes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Вермиллион! Дом металлических блоков и бесконечных труб.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Nobody actually knows what's in the pipes, though.\. We're probably best off not knowing.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: На самом деле никто не знает, что в трубах.\. Лучше, наверное, и не знать.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Vermillion town is also home of these friendly metal-armored fellows.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Вермиллион также является домом для этих дружелюбных парней в металлической броне.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Like most folks, they don't like to be hit. They really don't like it.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Как и большинству людей, им не нравится, когда их бьют. Им действительно не нравится это.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: But what am I saying? You saw what happened yesterday.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Хотя о чём это я? Ты видела, что случилось вчера.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Also be especially careful about that area in the north. They really don't like you to be there.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: И будь особенно осторожна в этой области на севере. Им очень не нравится, когда ты там.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Well, what am I saying? You already went ahead and explored the whole area, right?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Чего я рассказываю? Ты уже ушла вперёд и исследовала всю область, верно?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Then again, folks were talking about some nice treasure you can get when you manage to sneak past them.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: С другой стороны, люди говорили о каком-то хорошем сокровище, которое можно получить, если удастся пробраться мимо них.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Now let's exit the town \c[3]to the west\c[0]!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Теперь давай выйдем из города \c[3]на запад\c[0]!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Head to the west from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Отправляйтесь на запад от \c[3]Пустоши Вермиллион - Западный город\c[0], чтобы продолжить экскурсию Лукаса.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: Welcome to my little \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland Tour\c[0]!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Добро пожаловать на мою маленькую \c[3]экскурсию по Пустоши Вермиллион\c[0]!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: I will show you all the remarkable sights of this truly underappreciated landscape.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Я покажу тебе все прекрасные достопримечательности этого по-настоящему недооценённого ландшафта.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Поговорите с Лукасом в \c[3]Пустоши Вермиллион - Западный город\c[0], чтобы продолжить его экскурсию.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.orig: I can't believe we're stuck here with nothing to do.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.text: Я не могу поверить, что мы застряли здесь без дела.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.orig: Should we just go out and grind a bit?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.text: Может, выйти из города и немного покачаться?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Those markers will catch the laser beams. Use them for your protection.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Эти метки будут ловить лазерные лучи. Используйте их для своей защиты.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Alright, Lea, we are ready to start.
Here is what you need to do, listen closely.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Вот что тебе нужно сделать, слушай внимательно.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Our goal is to \c[3]zap every Evotar in this area\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Наша цель заключается в том, чтобы \c[3]облучить всех эвотаров в этой области\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: For every Evotar there are \c[3]3 steps to follow\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Для каждого эвотара есть \c[3]три простых шага\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]First\c[0]: You need to defeat a nearby \c[3]Shredder unit\c[0] to start the \c[3]Fixation Routine\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: \c[3]Первый\c[0]: ты должна победить \c[3]Шредера\c[0] поблизости, чтобы начать \c[3]программу фиксации\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]Second\c[0]: Move the defeated Shredder \c[3]close to the Evotar\c[0] to \c[3]fixate it\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: \c[3]Второй\c[0]: перемести побеждённого Шредера \c[3]ближе к эвотару\c[0], чтобы \c[3]зафиксировать его\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]Third\c[0]: The \c[3]fixated Evotar\c[0] needs to be \c[3]hit by the laser\c[0].
If you can't find any Evotars, \c[3]standing on Laser Catchers\c[0] will make them point at the nearest one.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Если ты не можешь найти эвотаров, \c[3]встань на Лазерный уловитель\c[0], чтобы он указал на ближайшего из них.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Everyone, follow Lea and focus on fighting the Shredders!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Следуйте за Леей и сосредоточьтесь на борьбе со Шредерами!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.orig: Spheromancer Lea! We found more players in the forest!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.text: Сферомант Лея! Мы нашли игроков в лесу!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.orig: Good! You can look for more Evotars further to the east!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.text: Хорошо! Вы можете поискать ещё эвотаров дальше на востоке!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.orig: Sup?\. We brought more Evotars from along the river!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.text: Чё как?\. Мы привели эвотаров с реки!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.orig: Good! Please join Apollo and Joern in the east of the town!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.text: Хорошо! Пожалуйста, присоединяйтесь к Аполло и Йорну в восточной части города!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Looks like we caught them all in this area.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Похоже, что мы поймали их всех в этой области.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Emilie, Lukas, you both stay here and make sure that no enemies interfere with the Evotars.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Эмили, Лукас, вы оба останетесь здесь и будете следить за тем, чтобы враги не мешали эвотарам.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Lea, you head to the east and join with the others!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Лея, ты на восток к остальным!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: We got this area covered! Good luck over there, chérie!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Мы прикроем эту область! Удачи тебе там, chérie (дорогая)!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.orig: They exploded!\. Just like Emilie back then!
What?! Is that what happened to me?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.text: Что?! Это то, что случилось со мной?!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/459/setti.orig: Laser bridge! The only true kind of bridge!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/459/setti.text: Лазерный мост! Единственный истинный вид моста!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: I've been here before and saw a lot of players running around, acting strange.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Я была здесь раньше и видела много игроков вокруг, ведущих себя странно.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: And now it's all empty.\. What happened?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: И теперь всё пусто.\. Что произошло?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Was it some kind of beta test?
You have sort of a knack in spotting me in strange places, don't you?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: У тебя талант замечать меня в необычных местах, не так ли?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: You know what? This calls for a little reward!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Знаешь что? Это заслуживает небольшой награды!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Anyway...\. Nothing going on here, so I'll be off.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Так или иначе...\. Здесь ничего не происходит, поэтому мне пора.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Let's see what else I can find!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Посмотрим, что ещё я смогу найти!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: How did they manage to get into this place...\. and out again?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Как ей удалось попасть в это место...\. и выбраться?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Yes, that is what I wonder as well.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Да, это то, чему я тоже удивляюсь.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Yes, I know. I did not manage to do that with you.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Да, я знаю. Мне не удалось провернуть это с тобой.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: I thought it was impossible without violating security constraints.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Я думал, это невозможно без нарушения ограничений безопасности.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: They must have found a better loophole, I supposed.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Полагаю, что они нашли лазейку получше.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/463/setti.orig: That building to the far north!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/465/setti.orig: But I guess my user ID changed since I'm now an Evotar of my old self.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/465/setti.text: Но видимо, мой ID изменился, я же теперь эвотар прошлого себя.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/465/setti.orig: Ah... yes.\. That should do it.
